General.Name: Lung Hwa Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Lung Hwa Electronics Co., Ltd. provides maritime SAT communication network, CCTV IoT, and cyber security solutions in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers maritime networking architect products; maritime antennas; and L-band iridium maritime antennas, as well as VHSAT flat portable terminals for emergency services, disaster recovery, military, security, government, and enterprise communication applications. It serves general cargo, oil carrier and cargo, fishery, and Ro-Ro passenger vessels and yachts, and oil and gas platforms. The company was founded in 1962 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
